report.name: facres

userParameter.name: P_FILTRE
userParameter.comment: Sert à afficher les critères de selection

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select F.NUMFACT, F.TYPFACT, F.SOCFACT, F.DATFACT, decode(L.TYPFACT, 'A', (-1 * L.LMONTHT), L.LMONTHT ) as fmontht, F.FENRCOMPTA, F.FREGCOMPTA, L.LNUM, substr(F.FDEPPOLE,1,17) FDEPPOLE , substr( SI.LIBDSG,1,17) LIBDSG, F.FMODREGLT, L.LMOISPREST, decode(c.top30,'N',substr(F.cav,2,2),'O',decode(f.cav,'000',null,f.cav)), F.numcont, L.lcodcompta from Facture F, Ligne_fact L, contrat c, Societe S, Struct_info SI where F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT and F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT and F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT and F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT and F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE and F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG and c.numcont = f.numcont and c.soccont = f.soccont and c.cav = f.cav &P_WHERE order by 4 asc,1 asc, 12 asc
dataSource.comment: Deux selects : s1 union s2 s1 : rammerne les factures avec contrat (celles qu'ont un contrat, leur filiale est compara au filiale d'utilisateur) s2 : les factures sans contrat

dataItem.name: decode_c_top30_N_substr_F_cav_
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode C Top30 N Substr F Cav

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( c.top30 , 'N' , substr ( F.cav , 2 , 2 ) , 'O' , decode ( f.cav , '000' , null , f.cav ) )

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select: select rnom||' '||rprenom nom --, pack_global.lire_perime(:P_GLOBAL) perime from ressource where ident = :P_PARAM6;

dataSource.name: Q_4
dataSource.select: select libcfrais from centre_frais where codcfrais = :P_PARAM5;

function.name: afterpform
rtrimetoile
b_4formattrigger
b_5formattrigger
cfraisformattrigger
f_cfformattrigger
f_cfraisformattrigger

report.webSource:
<%@ taglib uri="/WEB-INF/lib/reports_tld.jar" prefix="rw" %> <%@ page language="java" import="java.io.*" errorPage="/rwerror.jsp" session="false" %> <%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1" %> <!-- <rw:report id="report"> <rw:objects id="objects"> </rw:objects> -->

<rw:style id="yourStyle"> <!-- Report Wizard inserts style link clause here --> </rw:style>
</head>
<body>
